tooltip.title: Inherited
tooltip.html: By default, this option is selected for all nodes below the Processes node. When selected, the node will inherit monitoring choices from its parent.

tooltip.title: Enabled
tooltip.html: When selected, monitoring choices are individually enabled for this node. (The node does not inherit monitoring choices from its parent.) To select this option, you must first deselect the Inherited option.

tooltip.title: Alert on Restart
tooltip.html: When selected, the system will send an event when the process restarts.

tooltip.title: Event Severity
tooltip.html: Select an event severity (Critical, Error, Warning, Info, or Debug). This severity level is applied to the event created when the process fails.

tooltip.title: Pattern
tooltip.html:
Enter text (as a regular expression) that the system will match to define this process.
More information about: regular expressions

tooltip.title: Ignore Parameters
tooltip.html: Select this option to ignore command parameters when matching processes. By default, this option is disabled.

tooltip.title: Device
tooltip.html: Click to display devices on which the selected process or processes are running.

tooltip.title: Events
tooltip.html: Click to display events associated with the selected process or processes.
